product_name: CGear Multimats Sand-Free Multimat - Small 6 x 6
long_description: The small 6x6 CGear Multimats Sand-Free Multimat minimizes sand, dirt and dust in your outdoor environment. Use it on the beach, while camping or anywhere you want to avoid kicking up dirt.
short_description: The small 6x6 CGear Multimats Sand-Free Multimat minimizes sand, dirt and dust in your outdoor environment. Use it on the beach, while camping or anywhere you want to avoid kicking up dirt.
